data.name: beatmapset_update_notice.new
data.value: Just letting you know that there has been a new update in beatmap "{0}" since your last visit.

data.name: beatmapset_update_notice.subject
data.value: New update for beatmap "{0}"

data.name: beatmapset_update_notice.unwatch
data.value: If you no longer wish to watch this beatmap, you can either click the "Unwatch" link found in the page above, or from the modding watchlist page:

data.name: beatmapset_update_notice.visit
data.value: Visit the discussion page here:

data.name: common.closing
data.value: Regards,

data.name: common.report
data.value: Please reply to this email IMMEDIATELY if you did not request this change.

data.name: donation_thanks.benefit_more
data.value: More new supporter benefits will appear over time, as well!

data.name: donation_thanks.feedback
data.value: If you have any questions or feedback, don't hesitate to reply to this mail; I'll get back to you as soon as possible!

data.name: donation_thanks.keep_free
data.value: It is thanks to people like you that osu! is able to keep the game and community running smoothly without any advertisements or forced payments.

data.name: donation_thanks.keep_running
data.value: Your support keeps osu! running for around {0}! It may not seem like much, but it all adds up :).

data.name: donation_thanks.subject
data.value: Thanks, osu! <3s you

data.name: donation_thanks.translation
data.value: A community-provided translation for informational purposes follows:

data.name: donation_thanks.benefit.gift
data.value: Your giftee(s) will now have access to osu!direct and many other supporter benefits.

data.name: donation_thanks.benefit.self
data.value: You will now have access to osu!direct and many other supporter benefits for {0}.

data.name: donation_thanks.support._
data.value: Thanks a lot for your {0} towards osu!.

data.name: donation_thanks.support.first
data.value: support

data.name: donation_thanks.support.repeat
data.value: continued support

data.name: forum_new_reply.new
data.value: Just letting you know that there has been a new reply in "{0}" since your last visit.

data.name: forum_new_reply.subject
data.value: [osu!] New reply for topic "{0}"

data.name: forum_new_reply.unwatch
data.value: If you no longer wish to watch this topic, you can either click the "Unsubscribe topic" link found at the bottom of the topic above, or from topic subscriptions management page:

data.name: forum_new_reply.visit
data.value: Jump straight to the latest reply using the following link:

data.name: password_reset.code
data.value: Your verification code is:

data.name: password_reset.requested
data.value: Either you or someone pretending to be you has requested a password reset on your osu! account.

data.name: password_reset.subject
data.value: osu! account recover

data.name: store_payment_completed.prepare_shipping
data.value: We have received your payment and are preparing your order for shipping. It may take a few days for us to send it out, depending on the quantity of orders. You can follow the progress of your order here, including tracking details where available:

data.name: store_payment_completed.processing
data.value: We have received your payment and are currently processing your order. You can follow the progress of your order here:

data.name: store_payment_completed.questions
data.value: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reply to this email.

data.name: store_payment_completed.shipping
data.value: Shipping

data.name: store_payment_completed.subject
data.value: We received your osu!store order!

data.name: store_payment_completed.thank_you
data.value: Thanks for your osu!store order!

data.name: store_payment_completed.total
data.value: Total

data.name: supporter_gift.anonymous_gift
data.value: The person who gifted you this tag may choose to remain anonymous, so they have not been mentioned in this notification.

data.name: supporter_gift.anonymous_gift_maybe_not
data.value: But you likely already know who it is ;).

data.name: supporter_gift.duration
data.value: Thanks to them, you have access to osu!direct and other osu!supporter benefits for the next {0}.

data.name: supporter_gift.features
data.value: You can find out more details on these features here:

data.name: supporter_gift.gifted
data.value: Someone has just gifted you an osu!supporter tag!

data.name: supporter_gift.subject
data.value: You have been gifted an osu!supporter tag!

data.name: user_email_updated.changed_to
data.value: This is a confirmation email to inform you that your osu! email address has been changed to: "{0}".

data.name: user_email_updated.check
data.value: Please ensure that you received this email at your new address to prevent losing access your osu! account in the future.

data.name: user_email_updated.sent
data.value: For security reasons, this email has been sent both to your new and old email address.

data.name: user_email_updated.subject
data.value: osu! email change confirmation

data.name: user_force_reactivation.main
data.value: Your account is suspected to have been compromised, has recent suspicious activity or a VERY weak password. As a result, we require you to set a new password. Please make sure to choose a SECURE password.

data.name: user_force_reactivation.perform_reset
data.value: You can perform the reset from {0}

data.name: user_force_reactivation.reason
data.value: Reason:

data.name: user_force_reactivation.subject
data.value: osu! Account Reactivation Required

data.name: user_notification_digest.new
data.value: Just letting you know that there have been new updates on items you are watching.

data.name: user_notification_digest.settings
data.value: Change email notification preferences:

data.value: New osu! notifications

data.name: user_password_updated.confirmation
data.value: This is just a confirmation that your osu! password has been changed.

data.name: user_password_updated.subject
data.value: osu! password change confirmation

data.name: user_verification.code
data.value: Your verification code is:

data.name: user_verification.code_hint
data.value: You can enter the code with or without spaces.

data.name: user_verification.link
data.value: Alternatively, you can also visit this link below to finish verification:

data.name: user_verification.report
data.value: If you did not request this, please REPLY IMMEDIATELY as your account may be in danger.

data.value: osu! account verification

data.value: An action performed on your account from {0} requires verification.
